name: Network New Europe Ltd
goal: Innovation in the field of sustainable technologies. We seek to take ideas into a commercially viable state with partners from both industry, commerce and research. We seek to do this on a basis of long term benefits to participants and with an environmentally responsible perspective
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Our primary areas of interest relate to 1) Research and Innovation Activities 2) Environment, Energy and Industrial policy.
